locations.name: San Pedro de Atacama
locations.description: Primary base for exploring the Atacama Desert, known for its unique lunar landscapes, geysers, salt flats, and stargazing opportunities.

locations.name: Santiago
locations.description: Chile's vibrant capital city, offering a mix of history, culture, culinary experiences, and views of the Andes.

locations.name: Puerto Varas
locations.description: A key town in the scenic Lake District, located on Lake Llanquihue with views of Osorno and Calbuco volcanoes, serving as a base for exploring lakes and forests.

locations.name: Torres del Paine National Park
locations.description: Iconic Patagonian wilderness destination famed for its dramatic granite peaks (the 'Towers'), glaciers, lakes, and diverse wildlife.

locations.name: Santa Cruz
locations.description: Main town in the Colchagua Valley, one of Chile's premier wine regions, offering vineyard tours, wine tasting, and relaxation.
